text: application downtime is frustrating it
annoys customers affects your company's
reputation and can impact revenue
traditionally availability problems and
performance issues can take a long time
to fix because the root cause is
difficult to diagnose on-call engineers
need time to manually gather
troubleshooting data from different
systems and figure out who to coordinate
with to mitigate the impact of the issue
incident manager a new capability from
aws systems manager addresses these
frustrations by helping you resolve
problems faster and more efficiently it
prepares operations teams with automated
response plans that bring the right
people and information together when a
critical issue is detected incident
manager initiates the response plan
you've put in place on-call engineers
are given a run book to follow letting
them get started with the right
information and manual tasks can be
automated helping them resolve the issue
faster the incident dashboard tracks
updates metrics and runbook progress
this feature integrates with popular
chat and ticketing systems from aws
partners to raise visibility and promote
collaboration the dashboard also shows a
timeline of exactly what happened and
when helping you analyze how to improve
detection diagnosis and remediation
incident manager then suggests
post-incident action items like
automating a run-book step or adding a
new alarm so you can respond faster to
incidents in the future
get started today with aws systems
manager incident manager
[Music]
